items.title: Beats redesigned its new Powerbeats Fit’s wing tip to be more comfortable and secure
items.summary: Beats has announced a new version of the Fit Pro wireless earbuds that launched in late 2021, which are now called the Powerbeats Fit. The most notable upgrade is a redesigned wing tip that Beats says is 20 percent more flexible, improving comfort while also keeping the earbuds more securely anchored in your ear. The […]

items.title: OpenAI’s new social video app will let you deepfake your friends
items.summary: OpenAI has a new version of its Sora AI video generator, and it’s being launched alongside a new social video app, also called Sora, on iOS. The app, currently invite-only, resembles TikTok. But instead of encouraging people to stitch together duets, it asks you to record short videos that anyone can spin into new AI-generated […]

items.title: OpenAI releases an invitation-only Sora app on iOS, powered by Sora 2, to let people create and share AI-generated videos of themselves and their friends (Ina Fried/Axios)
items.summary:
Ina Fried / Axios:
OpenAI releases an invitation-only Sora app on iOS, powered by Sora 2, to let people create and share AI-generated videos of themselves and their friends  —  An Android version will follow eventually, OpenAI told Axios.  — The social app is powered by Sora 2, a new version of OpenAI's video model, which also launched Tuesday.

items.title: Microsoft’s Windows 11 2025 update is available now
items.summary: Microsoft is rolling out its annual Windows 11 update (known as version 25H2) today. After testing the update in the Windows Insider Release Preview ring last month, version 25H2 is now starting to roll out to all Windows 11 users through Windows Update. The 25H2 update isn’t a huge one, so it won’t take long […]

items.title: Greenworks’ 2nd-gen 40V 12-inch cordless compact chainsaw with a 2.0Ah battery is back down at $128 (Reg. $170)
items.summary:
Amazon is offering the Greenworks 40V 12-inch Gen 2 Cordless Compact Chainsaw with 2.0Ah battery at $127.99 shipped, which matches the price we’re seeing direct from the brand’s website. Outside of discounts, you’d be shelling out $170 for this model at full price, which we’ve seen dropping to $128 twice before in 2025 and a fall lower to $120 that occurred during July’s Prime Day event. You can pick your own up today with $42 slashed from the tag, giving you the second-best price of the year that only sits $8 above July’s annual low.

items.title: Roundup: Mucilage, jellyfish invasions threaten fishing industry in Türkiye's Marmara Sea
items.summary: ISTANBUL, Sept. 30 (Xinhua) -- Since the start of the fishing season in September, Türkiye's Sea of Marmara has experienced concurrent outbreaks of mucilage and jellyfish, resulting in nets being torn and frequently retrieved coated with seabed slime. Read full story

items.title: Save up to 28% on BougeRV’s portable electric coolers for any of your vehicles starting from $160 (Reg. $190+)
items.summary:
Through its official Amazon storefront, BougeRV is offering up to 28% discounts on a lineup of 12V portable electric fridge/freezers, starting with the 23-Quart Portable Cooler at $159.99 shipped, with other 30, 42, and 53-quart sizes available below the fold, all with multiple colorways to choose from. The smallest of these here would normally run you $190 at full price, which we’ve mostly seen drop between $170 and $160 over the year, with some select falls lower to $157 last seen in August. Today’s deal gives you a solid $30 markdown off the going rate for the second-best price of the year and the fourth-lowest overall – just $8 above the all-time low.

items.title: Ring unveils lineup of 2K and 4K cameras supported by AI to interact with visitors and track down lost dogs
items.summary:
Today, as part of Amazon’s live 2025 device reveal event, Ring has unveiled its first-ever 4K cameras (and two 2K cameras) supported by AI for even more advanced security around your home. This is the most advanced lineup from the brand to date, with seven new models to choose from and AI support that helps to reunite lost pets with their loving families. These new devices capture critical details with precision, as the brand puts it: with “videos that look closer to what your eyes can naturally see.” Head below to learn more about this new generation of security devices.

items.title: Amazon just unleashed its new Blink 2K security camera lineup with Arc accessory for 180-degree FoV
items.summary:
Amazon has debuted a bunch of new devices as part of its fall hardware event, including a new lineup for 2K security cameras. Amazon’s security camera brand Blink will have two new security cameras up for grabs later today – the Outdoor 2K+ and the Mini 2K+, both with support for up to 2K resolution. Additionally, we also got a new accessory called Blink Arc, which will let you combine two Blink Mini 2K+ cameras into a single unit for a seamlessly stitched 180-degree FoV feed. The Blink Outdoor 2K+ is priced at $89.99 shipped, while the Mini 2K+ will cost you $49.99 shipped. Head below for more details on the new cameras as well as the Arc accessory.

more…

items.title: This originally $100 3-in-1 charging cube for your entire Apple kit is down to just $22.50 low today
items.summary:
LISEN 3-in-1 wireless charging cube

Buy for $22.50 (Reg. $40)

Enter promo code AEQKRK3Y for $16.97 off.

What we love

This multi-device charging station is designed to refuel your entire portable Apple kit simultaneously. When not in use, it folds neatly into a compact cube for easy storage. It features three wireless charging spots – one each for your iPhone, AirPods, and Apple Watch. As for the charging speeds, it delivers up to 7.5W for your iPhone, while the AirPods and Apple Watch pads provide 2.5W each. It may not be the fastest charger around, but we particularly like this model for its compact, foldable design, and budget-friendly price.

October is almost here, which means a new wave of LEGO sets hitting shelves as the clock ticks us over into a new month. Many of these new building sets have been revealed ahead of time, with this upcoming month being another smaller – yet jam-packed – event. We’ve got holiday exclusives all the way up to the largest and most expensive LEGO set to ever release, so this won’t be a quiet month for builders. items.title: This HP OMEN 14-inch RTX 5070 3K OLED gaming laptop delivers serious value today at $440 off
items.summary:
Today only, as part of its Deals of the Day offers, Best Buy currently has HP’s OMEN Transcend 14-inch 3K OLED gaming laptop down at $1,599.99 shipped. This particular model with an RTX 5070 GPU typically goes for $2,040, so you’re looking at a $440 discount on it today. It dropped to this rate for the first time earlier this month during the Labor Day sale, and today’s deal marks the return of that price to give you another chance to score it if you missed out earlier this month. This is the lowest price we have tracked for this notebook that’s packed with some powerful hardware, and you can learn more about it in detail below.

items.title: Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion Remastered physical deluxe edition now live at $40 on Amazon
items.summary:
Considering how popular the announcement The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion Remastered was for 9to5Toys readers, we are doing something little bit different for this morning’s games post – the physical deluxe edition of the game is now live on Amazon for pre-order. While many expected the price to be much higher, you can now secure a physical copy of Oblivion Remastered on PS5 or Xbox Series X|S at $39.99 shipped – that’s less than the digital copy on the PlayStation Store. Now set for release on October 13, if you’re looking to secure a boxed copy for your collection, Amazon’s physical deluxe copy is now live with some extra goodies – a digital art book and soundtrack, new quests for a series of new armor, weapons, and horse armor sets, and the expected Shivering Isles & Knights of the Nine story expansions.

items.summary:
INIU 100W 3-Port USB-C Wall Charger

Buy for $16.50 (Reg. $33)

Clip the on-page 45% off coupon.

What we love

This 3-port 100W INIU charger is a solid pick if you want a brick to tap into fast charging support for the latest iPhone 17 lineup. With enough power to also handle a MacBook, it can easily be the only charger you need on the go. It offers up a total of three ports, two of which are Type-C, and the other is USB-A. What we particularly like about this charger is that it’s relatively smaller than many other multi-port chargers out there, and it even ships with a USB-C cable.
